ï»¿What time do you get up in the morning and how do you start your day?
Normally between 6:30 and 7 o'clock in the morning...
...and then I first have a cup of coffee.
How many pairs of Adidas do you own?
I don't know exactly, to be honest, but I think it's close to a hundred.

I don't mind as long as they buy our shoes.
What did you wanna be when you grew up?
My name is Herbert Hainer and I am happy to be the CEO of Adidas.
